documentation.text:
@dev The addresses of the SeriesController contract which will be approved
 with an allowance of MAX_UINT for all tokens held in the SeriesVault
@notice Emitted when the SeriesVault is initialized

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "SeriesVault: Sender must be the seriesController"

arguments.value: SeriesVault: Sender must be the seriesController

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "SeriesVault: Sender must be the seriesController"

documentation.text: @notice Check if the msg.sender is the privileged SeriesController contract address
